entries.title: XBB.1.5 omicron subvariant is the most transmissible version of Covid yet, WHO says
entries.description: The WHO does not have any data yet on the severity of XBB.1.5, but there's no indication it makes people sicker than previous subvariants, top official said.

entries.title: Salesforce is cutting 10% of its personnel, more than 7,000 employees
entries.description: Salesforce is cutting 10% of its personnel and reducing some office space as part of a restructuring plan, the company announced Wednesday.

entries.title: Alibaba, other China ADRs surge as Ant Group capital plan approval fuels hope for relaxing scrutiny
entries.description: Ant Group, which previously had its own IPO plans scuttled by regulatory concerns, was allowed to double its registered capital as part of the new plan.

entries.title: Share of new car buyers with a monthly payment of more than $1,000 hits record high
entries.description: High prices and rising interest rates are causing an affordability problem for many car shoppers.

entries.title: Fed officials see higher rates for 'some time' ahead
Paramount sued for $500 million over 1968 'Romeo & Juliet' nude scene
entries.description: Two stars of the 1968 film adaption of "Romeo & Juliet" have sued Paramount Pictures for more than $500 million over a nude scene the actors shot when they were teenagers.

entries.title: Meta fined more than $400 million by Irish regulator over EU privacy breaches
entries.description: The Irish Data Protection Commission fined Meta over $400 million Wednesday after finding its Facebook and Instagram services breached EU privacy rules.

entries.title: Nonprofit financed by billionaire George Soros quietly donated $140 million to political causes in 2021
entries.description: A George Soros backed nonprofit put $140 million into politically charged groups in the buildup to the 2022 midterm elections.

entries.title: Nonprofit financed by billionaire George Soros quietly donated $140 million to political causes in 2021
entries.description: A George Soros backed nonprofit put $140 million into politically charged groups in the buildup to the 2022 midterm elections.

entries.title: Dubai announces $8.7 trillion economic plan to boost trade, investment and global hub status
entries.description: Dubai aims to double the size of its economy in the next decade and become one of the "top 3 economic cities around the world," the ruler of Dubai tweeted.

entries.title: French bakers allowed to renegotiate sky-high bills with the daily baguette under threat
entries.description: Higher crop and energy prices left many of the country's baguette-makers facing collapse.

entries.title: Europe starts 2023 with historic winter heatwave; snow shortage forces ski resorts to close
entries.description: Meteorologists and climatologists expressed alarm over the unseasonably warm winter weather.

entries.title: China risks loom over U.S. tech giants Tesla and Apple as share prices plunge
entries.description: Apple and Tesla are facing headwinds in China with concerns over consumer strength, which is contributing to investor jitters around the U.S. tech giants.

entries.title: UK PM Rishi Sunak to propose compulsory math for students up to 18
entries.description: U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will on Wednesday announce plans to force school pupils in England to study math up to the age of 18.

entries.title: The UK recession will be almost as deep as that of Russia, economists predict
entries.description: The U.K.'s economic contraction in 2023 will be almost as deep as that of Russia, economists expect, as a sharp fall in household living standards weighs on activity.

entries.title: Upstart Chinese electric car brand delivered more cars than Nio in 2022
entries.description: Another budget-priced electric car brand is taking off in China, this time selling compact SUVs.

entries.title: Ant gets approval to expand its consumer finance business
entries.description: Ant Group's consumer finance unit has received approval to more than double its registered capital, a sign of progress in resolving regulators' concerns.

entries.title: Manhattan apartment sales plunge in fourth quarter as brokers fear a frozen market
entries.description: Manhattan real estate brokers are concerned both buyers and sellers are staying on the sidelines.

entries.title: New to the job market? These 5 'soft' skills could give young workers an edge, according to LinkedIn
entries.description: "Hard skills can help you get a recruiter's attention, but soft skills can help you land the job," said a career expert from LinkedIn.

entries.title: Endeavor shares fall after video shows UFC boss Dana White hitting wife on New Year's Eve
entries.description: Endeavor, run by super agent Ari Emanuel, took full ownership of Dana White-run UFC in 2021.
